name: Reference
description: Container for a WorkFile representing a reference (e.g., a genome)

description.name: Optional, longer description of or comments about record

workFiles.name: ID(s) of the WorkFile(s) containing the reference (e.g., a 2bit genome file or a collection of FASTA files)

species.name: Scientific name of the species associated with the Reference, e.g., 'Homo sapiens'
